It’s never a bad time to treat yourself to a little somethin’ somethin’, but it’s even better when that somethin’ somethin’ is deeply discounted from R29-favorite retailer, Anthropologie. Whether you’re in the market for a seasonal wardrobe refresh or new decor to upgrade your home, Anthropologie is where it’s at. The brand just released a new crop of sale styles, and there are currently a whopping 4,100+ items discounted; from covetable, vacation-ready dresses and bestselling denim, to cozy bedding, statement soft furnishings, and gift-ready trinkets. (Yes, even those iconic monogram cocktail glasses are on sale right now!) To save you precious time and money, we’ve carefully sifted through to pick only the top Anthropologie deals under $100 — the very crème de la crème at that sweet spot between cheap thrill and fancy pants. So, sit back, scroll on, and enjoy all the savings we’ve found you (you can thank us later). All linked products are independently selected by our editors. If you purchase any of these products, we may earn a commission. For more can’t-miss shopping stories delivered straight to your inbox, sign up for our Most Wanted newsletter. DashDividers_1_500x100 The Best Anthropologie Homeware On Sale: Decor, Bedding, Gifts Nothing makes us happier than carting up stylish and unique home decor from Anthropologie. Our favorites, which are heavily discounted (some less than $13), include cozy, textured throws, personalized glassware, sculptural candle holders, and beautifully decorated jewelry boxes. DashDividers_1_500x100 The Best Anthropologie Dresses & Jumpsuits On Sale Anthropologie is a go-to for all our dress needs, whether we’re shopping for a wedding guest-appropriate gown, airy summer vacation midi, or sexy date-ready mini. Thanks to the Anthro sale section you can now score big on hundreds of new season designs — just in time for bare-leg weather too. DashDividers_1_500x100 The Best Anthropologie Bottoms On Sale: Pants, Jeans, Skirts, Shorts Lightweight lounge pants, office-appropriate trousers, trendy barrel-leg jeans, and slinky slip skirts — the Anthro sale has it all. DashDividers_1_500x100 The Best Anthropologie Tops On Sale: Blouses, T-Shirts, Knits Tops are perhaps the most hardworking component of our wardrobe — we can wear the same statement blouse to work, weddings, and the bar; the same graphic tee to the gym, brunch, and when traveling (depending on the styling). Don’t even get us started on light layers, knitwear, and sweatshirts: the real MVPs of transitional spring dressing. So, it’s about time we give this portion of our closet a much-needed refresh, thanks to the Anthropologie sale. DashDividers_1_500x100 The Best Anthropologie Coats & Jackets On Sale It may be heating up out there, but spring also brings turbulent weather; chilly mornings and evenings, surprise showers, and swift winds. Anthro’s sale section ensures we can stay warm, dry, and stylish. DashDividers_1_500x100 The Best Anthropologie Accessories On Sale: Shoes, Bags, Jewelry As Anthro’s sale section proves, you can make the biggest statement with the least effort — all you need is a pair of knock-out boots, a stand-out bag, or bold jewelry to complete your outfit.
